articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Delegates to Celebrations of 70th WPK Birthday
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Delegates to Celebrations of 70th WPK Birthday
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, had a photo session with the delegates to the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the WPK.
					 At the venue of the session, he received bouquets from Kim Kwang Min, chief coach of the April 25 Sports Team, and Kim Sun Hwa, chairperson of the Kaechon City Cooperative Farm Management Committee.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the delegates for having contributed to the sacred struggle for the strengthening of the WPK, defence of socialism and prosperity of the country while adorning the annuals of the revolution with shining victory and glory. And he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He expressed belief that they would save their honor of being the core of the party and guide of the times in the drive to further strengthen the WPK into the revolutionary party of Juche advancing under the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the mother party loving and devotedly serving the people and build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Accompanying him in the photo session were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, officials of the WPK Central Committee and chief secretaries of provincial committees of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Military Parade
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with Participants in Military Parade
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, had a photo session with the participants in the military parade celebrating the 70th anniversary of the WPK.
					 When he appeared at the venue of the photo session, servicepersons of the Ground, Naval and Air and Anti-Air Force of the KPA presented bouquets to him on behalf of the participants.
					
					 Kim Jong Un highly appreciated the participants for having again displayed through a successful Korean-style military parade, most splendid and peculiar, the imposing looks of the KPA which has grown to be an elite revolutionary strong army under the guidance of the WPK. And he had a picture taken with them.
					
					 He expressed belief that they would creditably discharge their mission and duty as the powerful vanguard and shock-brigade in the sacred road of defending the country, the revolution and the people, holding the red flag of the WPK as the first colors.
					
					 Accompanying him in the photo session were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the KPA and commanding officers of the military parade units.

articles.title: Congratulations to Belarusian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Belarusian President
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Aleksandr Lukashenko upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Belarus.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in conformity with the desire and aspiration of the two peoples, sincerely wishing the president of Belarus greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and its people's wellbeing.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Turkish President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Turkish President
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of sympathy to Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Oct. 13 as regards the terrorist attack in Ankara that claimed many casualties.
					 The message extended deep sympathy and consolations to the president and, through him, to the victims and their bereaved families and the Turkish government.
					
					 Reaffirming the principled stand of the DPRK against all forms of terrorist acts, the message sincerely hoped the Turkish people would recover from the damage as early as possible.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nepali Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepali Prime Minister
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to K. P. Sharma Oli on his election as prime minister of Nepal.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in different fields and wished him success in his responsible work for the political stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Vice Premier Meets Russian Government Delegation
articles.content:
DPRK Vice Premier Meets Russian Government Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Vice-Premier Ro Tu Chol had a talk with a Russian government delegation led by Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Minister of Development of Far East
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Minister of Development of Far East 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with a gift by Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East of the Russian Federation, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Vice Premier Ro Tu Chol on Wednesday by the minister of the Development of Far East who is heading a Russian government delegation.

articles.title: Russian Government Delegation Visits Combined Service Boat Mujigae
articles.content:
Russian Government Delegation Visits Combined Service Boat Mujigae
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A Russian government delegation led by Alexandr Galushka, minister of the Development of Far East, visited the combined service boat Mujigae on Wednesday.
					 The guests looked round various modern service facilities of Mujigae which was built on the River Taedong thanks to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Meanwhile, they toured the Jongbaek Church.

articles.title: Minutes of Talks between Co-Chairmen of DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Committee Signed
articles.content:
Minutes of Talks between Co-Chairmen of DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Committee Signed
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Minutes of the talks between the co-chairmen of the DPRK-Russia Inter-governmental Committee for Cooperation of Trade, Economy, Science and Technology were signed here on Wednesday.
					 Present at the signing ceremony were Minister of External Economic Relations Ri Ryong Nam, chairman of the DPRK side to the committee, officials concerned, Minister of the Development of Far East of the Russian Federation Alexandr Galushka, chairman of the Russian side to the committee, members of a Russian government delegation and Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora.
					
					 The minutes of the talks were signed by Ri Ryong Nam and Alexandr Galushka.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Singapore Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Singapore Appointed
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Nam was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Singapore, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Event for Marking Close of Year of DPRK-Russia Friendship Held
articles.content:
Event for Marking Close of Year of DPRK-Russia Friendship Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- An event for marking the close of the year of DPRK-Russia friendship took place here on Tuesday.
					 Present there were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in Pyongyang, a Russian government delegation led by Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East, a delegation of the United Russia Party headed by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the party and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, and other Russian guests, Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Ri Ryong Nam said that there took place between the two countries exchanges of delegations of different level including visits of high-ranking officials in the political, economic and cultural and all other fields, and political and cultural events in the period of the year of DPRK-Russia friendship.
					
					 He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia would grow stronger, saying that it is a consistent stand of the DPRK government to steadily develop the relations with Russia.
					
					 Alexandr Galushka said that the friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK are favorably developing under the deep care of President Putin and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He said that Russia would make all efforts for peace on the Korean Peninsula and the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora referred to the fact that multi-faceted exchanges in various fields including the joint performances of the State Merited Chorus and the Chongbong Band which were given in Russia contributed to demonstrating the comradely and friendly relations between the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on Oct. 6.
					 The national leader in the message said he extended the warmest congratulations and fraternal greetings to Kim Jong Un on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and its supporters and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The message expressed conviction that under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un the WPK would grow stronger day by day and certainly achieve the historic cause of building a thriving nation as desired by the great President Kim Il Sung and the great leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would invariably develop, sincerely wishing Kim Jong Un greater success in his noble work.

articles.title: Indonesian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Indonesian Delegation Arrives
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Constitution Examination Commission of the People's Consultative Council of Indonesia led by Vice-Chairman TB. Hasanuddin arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Delegation of URP Leaves URP
articles.content:
Delegation of URP Leaves 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Russian Party (URP) led by Andrei Klimov, member of the Standing Committee of the General Council of the URP and vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the Federation Council, left here for home Wednesday.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Visit International Friendship Exhibition House
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of the Juche idea who took part in the celebrations of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the International Friendship Exhibition House on October 13.
					 They paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk before their wax replicas. They are being lauded by all people as they performed immortal exploits before the era and history.
					
					 The guests looked round the gifts presented by party, state and government leaders, prominent figures and people of many countries of the world.
					
					 They made entries in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans, Foreigners Tour Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans, Foreigners Tour Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Overseas Koreans and foreigners who took part in the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They included Choe Ryong Ho, former vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China, and his party, Li Yonghao, general manager of the Dandong Shengmin Trading Co. Ltd., of China, and his party and a delegation of the Shengzhou Zhongqiao Mining Industry Co. Ltd., of Zhejiang Province, China headed by Deputy General Manager Cui Yingjun.
					
					  Being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members, they looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 They also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, etc.

articles.title: Anniversary of Central Information and Communications Center Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Central Information and Communications Center Marked
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Information and Communications Center in the DPRK marked its 70th founding anniversary.
					 It is an important center playing a pivotal role in the development of information and communications in the country as it is associated with the leadership exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the center was organized after the liberation of Korea and clearly indicated the orientation and way of its development. Visiting the center several times, he made sure that it developed into a Juche-oriented and popular post and tele-communications center making a positive contribution to the building of a rich and powerful country and to the service to the people.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the center marked its foundation day on October 14, Juche 34 (1945) when it ensured telephone communications for the Pyongyang mass rally welcoming the President's historic and triumphant return home.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place on Wednesday.
					
					 It was attended by Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea O Su Yong, Minister of Post and Telecommunications Kim Kwang Chol, officials concerned and officials and employees of the center.
					
					 A congratulatory message of the WPK Central Committee to the workers, technicians and officials of the center was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 The message highly appreciated the pivotal role played by the workers, technicians and officials of the center in the development of information and telecommunications of the country as they devotedly worked with warm patriotism and high responsibility for their revolutionary duty.
					
					 A report was delivered at the meeting to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: DPRK Team Beats Its Yemeni Rival in Football Match
articles.content:
DPRK Team Beats Its Yemeni Rival in Football Match
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK team beat its Yemeni rival 1:0 in their second match of the second-stage preliminaries of the Asian region for the 2018 FIFA World Cup, which was held at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Now the DPRK tops the rankings of Group H with four wins and one draw in five matches.
					
					 At around 10th minute of the Tuesday match, DPRK's Jong Il Gwan scored a goal on penalty kick.
					
					 Inspired by the enthusiastic cheering, the DPRK footballers overpowered the Yemeni opponents in the whole time of the match.
					
					 After the match, Ameen Ali Alsuaini, chief coach of the Yemeni team, told reporters that he'd like to say congratulations to the Korean team for doing such an enthusiastic game.
					
					 Kim Chang Bok, chief coach of the DPRK team, said the team would pay up to the trust of the local people by winning the preliminary matches.

articles.title: Grand Art Performance Goes on with Great Success
articles.content:
Grand Art Performance Goes on with Great Success
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A grand art performance "Great Party, Rosy Korea" for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea has been under way with great success on a huge floating stage of the Taedong River since Oct. 11.
					 10 000 persons are participating in the performance.
					
					 They put on the stage such numbers as male solo and chorus "Song of Comradeship" and chorus and dance "May, the Month of Victory," orchestral music and serial songs "Under the banner of the Party".
					
					 Among the artistes are veteran singers and instrumentalists who contributed to the development of the Juche-oriented music and arts under the loving care of leader Kim Jong Il .
					
					 The festive atmosphere revved up with the cheerful music pieces presented by the Pochonbo Electronic Ensemble and the then Wangjaesan Light Music Band and artistes well-known to the Korean people.
					
					 The performance mesmerized the audience not only because they presented rich voices, perfect ensemble and sweet melodies but also because they truthfully represented the profound yearning for Kim Jong Il who trained and projected them with a lot of efforts.
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Walled Township of Kyongsong
articles.content:
Walled Township of Kyongsong
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- In Kyongsong County, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK, there is a walled township in which the Korean ancestors bravely fought battles against the Japanese invaders during the Imjin Patriotic War (1592-1598).
					 The walls, believed to be built with earth in 1107 in an aim to defend the northern territory, were repaired in 1437.
					
					 Rebuilt in 1616-1622, they are 810 meters long from east to west and 290 meters long from north to south.
					
					 The walls, nine meters high, eight meters wide in the lower part and three to four meters wide in the upper part, have four gates in the north, south, east and west.
					
					 With 510 battlements, there is a 34-meter-wide and 4.5-meter-deep moat outside the walls.
					
					 Unearthed in the walled township were sites of storehouses, armories, 12 ponds and 54 wells.
					
					 Listed as one of national heritages, the walls give a glimpse of the architectural art of the Korean people in the middle ages.

articles.title: South Korea's War Scenario OPLAN 5015 under Fire
articles.content:
South Korea's War Scenario OPLAN 5015 under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean Joint Chiefs of Staff submitted OPLAN 5015 to the "National Assembly" as an alternative to OPLAN 5027.  OPLAN 5015 focuses "on bolstering the capabilities for striking the headquarters" including the scenario of making a prompt attack on the headquarters and communication facilities of the rival side.
					 The south Korean bellicose forces disclosed a plan for deploying ballistic missiles with the range of 800 km, making provocative remarks about "keeping the whole of the north within striking range and full-scale operation of Kill Chain to cope with the north's nukes and missiles". 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary observes that these reckless war drumbeats are screwing up the tension on the Korean Peninsula and pushing the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 mapped out by the south Korean warmongers together with the U.S. once again clearly reveals the south Korean authorities' real stance against dialogue and peace as they are keen to invade the DPRK in league with outsiders while talking volumes about the improvement of the north-south relations, the commentary notes, and warns:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which are still in a fragile state may collapse overnight if the south Korean authorities persist in political and military provocations to harm the fellow countrymen in the north with the backing of foreign forces as now.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations should not be allowed to become a scapegoat for the confrontation maniacs. 
					
					 The nation will never allow the south Korean authorities to escalate the confrontation with the compatriots, going against their unanimous desire for the national reconciliation, unity and improvement of the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Japan's Trite Trick to Dodge International Criticism under Fire by KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan's Trite Trick to Dodge International Criticism under Fire by KCNA Commentary 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Yamatani who had held the post of Japanese minister for the issue of abduction until recently talked rubbish making the profound confusing of the right and the wrong, terming the peaceful satellite launch of the DPRK pursuant to the state scientific and technological development plan for the building of an economic power and the improvement of the people's living standard a "threat".
					 Deeming it as a major political tenet to advocate independence, peace and friendship, the DPRK has consistently implemented it and made positive efforts for defending peace and stability in the region.
					
					 By origin, Japan has neither face nor justification to talk this or that about the exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The reason is that it is none other than Japan which is posing major threat to the region, pushing its situation to instability and to the brink of a war.
					
					 Far from drawing a lesson from its history of defeat, Japan has steadily consolidated economic, military and legal groundwork for realizing its ambition for becoming a leader in Asia.
					
					 It has denied its past aggression and stepped up the lurch of the Japanese society to the right and militarization by drastically increasing military spending.
					
					 In March, Japan launched a spy satellite and openly said that it was aimed to gather military information about the DPRK.
					
					 On September 18, it passed security bills through the full-dress session of the House of Councilors despite strong censure and opposition of the world, thereby providing legal conditions for launching overseas aggression together with the U.S. any moment.
					
					 This shows that Japan's ambition for reinvasion has reached the extremes.
					
					 This notwithstanding, Japan has become vocal about "threat" from someone. This cannot but be sophism, the height of impudence.
					
					 The story about "threat from north Korea" being floated by Tokyo is nothing but a poor trick to divert elsewhere the international community's bitter criticism of it.
					
					 Now Japan is under fire at home and abroad for its undisguised moves for reinvasion including the adoption of the security legislation.
					
					 Much upset by this, Japan is trumpeting about the old theory of "threat from north Korea" in a bid to get rid of its unfavorable position.
					
					 In other words, by noisily advertising the DPRK as "a state posing threat", Japan seeks to make the world drop its negative view on the scenario for domination over Asia.
					
					 Japan has committed too monstrous crimes in the past to hide them and its ambition for reinvasion is extremely dangerous.
					
					 No country will be taken in by Japan's clumsy farce.
					
					 Japan had better make sincere apology and reparation for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity in the past at an early date, instead of resorting to the above-said trick.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale War Exercises in Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Large-scale War Exercises in Forefront Areas
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The First Army Corps of the south Korean army is mulling staging a large-scale combined exercise in Koyang, Phaju, Ryonchon and other places in Kyonggi Province, the forefront areas, from Oct. 14 to 20, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 The warmongers are contemplating hurling huge forces including force and armored weapons of the army corps into the projected war rehearsal while crying out for acquiring and examining the combined operation capabilities of civilians, government officials and service personnel to cope with infiltration of someone.
					
					 They had better stop at once the war racket going against the trend of the times.

articles.title: DPRK Photo, Book, Stamp and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in Different Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Photo, Book, Stamp and Fine Art Exhibitions Open in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book, stamp and fine art exhibitions were opened in Russia, Bulgaria and China on Oct. 1 and 7 on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos documenting the party building and leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works, and books, photos and stamps introducing the DPRK and fine art works associated with the talents of the Korean people.

articles.title: Events Held Abroad to Mark WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Events Held Abroad to Mark WPK's Birthday 
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures, Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held by the Czechoslovak Communist Party, the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism, the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway on October 7 to mark the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed in leading the party-building.
					
					 On display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK prospering under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The participants watched the Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp".
					
					 Iri Vabr, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that the Korean people achieved epoch-making prosperity and progress in socialist construction under the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism said that the Korean people would surely build a socialist economic power and accomplish the cause of national reunification under the leadership of the WPK headed by First Secretary Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, said that the WPK has successfully played the role of the headquarters of the Korean revolution under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il after its foundation.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Finland and Norway.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Germany, UK
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Germany, UK
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Organs of the German and British political parties carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The October issue of Rote Fahne, the organ of the German Communist Party, carried an article titled "Invincible Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious, it noted, saying that the Korean people are calling the WPK a mother party and absolutely trusting and following it.
					
					 The New Worker, the organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, on October 2 carried an article titled "70 years of victory" illustrated with  a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un. The article said that the WPK has led the Korean revolution to victory despite ceaseless economic sanctions by foiling the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression over the last 70 years. 
					
					 It noted that all successes achieved by the WPK were a fruition of the outstanding leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle of the Korean people for building socialism and achieving the reunification of the country true to the behests of the great leaders, it stressed.

articles.title: Spanish Party Leader Calls on All Communist Parties to Learn from Experience of WPK
articles.content:
Spanish Party Leader Calls on All Communist Parties to Learn from Experience of WPK
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Democratic Workers' Party of Spain made public a statement on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated the country and founded the glorious WPK on Oct. 10, 1945.
					
					 Under the guidance of the WPK the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists and won a great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 As proven by the reality of socialist Korea, the Songun politics pursued by the WPK is the only political mode in the world as it protects peaceful and happy life of the Korean people from foreign forces' moves for aggression.
					
					 The wise leadership of the WPK not only defended the sovereignty and peace of the country but triumphantly advanced socialist construction by achieving the single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses. 
					
					 All communist parties of the world should earnestly learn from the experience the WPK and the Korean people gained in socialist construction. 
					
					 We will continue studying the experience of the WPK in its struggle and intensify our activities to let the Spanish people know about the reality of the DPRK.

articles.title: Ceremony of Unveiling Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Held in Russia
articles.content:
Ceremony of Unveiling Tablet to Honor Kim Jong Il Held in Russia
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- A tablet to honor leader Kim Jong Il was displayed at the "Vlad Khleb" Bread Factory in Vladivostok, Russia.
					 Inscribed on the tablet in Korean and Russian was the sentence "Generalissimo of the DPRK Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the 'Vlad Khleb' Bread Factory on August 23, 2002 during his visit to the Far East Federal District of the Russian Federation."
					
					 The ceremony of unveiling the tablet was held on the spot on October 9.
					
					 Displayed there were photos of Kim Jong Il looking round the factory.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Maritime Territory Administration of Russia, the mission of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia in Vladivostok, Far Eastern Federal University, the Vladivostok newspaper office, Prima-Media News Service and the factory and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK consul general in Vladivostok and DPRK officials working there.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Then the tablet was unveiled.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Spain
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was brought out in booklet by the Anfer Publishing House of Spain on Oct. 5.
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) deals with the idea that the leadership of the party is the decisive guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and clarifies the matter of developing the Workers' Party of Korea into the Juche-type revolutionary party and a basic way of performing the mission and duty of the party as a leadership political body.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
						
 Pyongyang, October 14 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted on the Polish website "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea" on Oct. 8.
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), serves as a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the WPK that paved a new way for building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, and indicates the way for developing the WPK into his eternal party.
					
					 A photo of Kim Il Sung was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma fotos con delegados a actos por aniversario 70 de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma fotos con delegados a actos por aniversario 70 de PTC
						
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio con los delegados a los actos festivos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al lugar de filmacion, le entregaron los ramos de flores Kim Kwang Min, entrenador de futbol del Conjunto Deportivo 25 de Abril y Kim Sun Hwa, presidenta del Comite de Gestion Agricola de la Granja Cooperativa de la ciudad de Kaechon.
					
					El Mariscal felicito calurosamente a los delegados quienes hicieron aporte al desarrollo del partido, la defensa del socialismo y la sagrada lucha por la prosperidad de la patria registrando las enorgullecedoras victorias y glorias en los anales de la revolucion y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los delegados consolidaran el PTC como partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano que avanza enarbolando la bandera del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo y como partido-madre que ama al pueblo y sacrificarse para ello y ostentaran el honor de los integrantes medulares del partido y orientadores de la epoca en  la lucha por construir un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los funcionarios del Comite Central y los secretarios jefes provinciales del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un toma fotos con participantes en desfile militar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un toma fotos con participantes en desfile militar
						
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio con los participantes en el desfile militar en celebracion del 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					El Mariscal salio al lugar de filmacion.
					
					En representacion de los participantes, oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC le rindieron ramos de flores.
					
					El Mariscal evaluo altamente a los participantes quienes demostraron una vez mas al mundo el aspecto impetuoso del EPC formado como fuerzas armadas de flor y nata bajo la  orientacion al realizar en el nivel maximo el esplendido y singular desfile militar a estilo coreano y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los participantes cumpliran excelentemente con la mision y deber como vanguardistas potentes en el sagrado trabajo para defender la patria, la revolucion y al pueblo enarbolando como unico estandarte la bandera roja del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, los miembros de mando del EPC y los comandantes de las unidades participantes en el desfile.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto clausural de ano de amistad Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto clausural de ano de amistad Corea-Rusia
						
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en esta capital el acto clausural del ano de amistad Corea-Rusia.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Ri Ryong Nam, ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, el vicecanciller Pak Myong Guk, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Rusia y vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Kim Jin Bom,  los funcionarios interesados, los trabajadores capitalinos, asi como la delegacion gubernamental de Rusia encabezada por Alexandr Galushka, ministro de Desarrollo del Lejano Oriente, la delegacion del Partido Rusia Unida presidida por Andrei Klimov, miembro del comite permanente del Consejo General del Partido Rusia Unida y vicepresidente del Comite de Asuntos Internacionales del Consejo de Federacion de Rusia, y otros huespedes rusos, el embajador Alexandr Matsegora y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica rusa en la RPDC.
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ocasion.
					
					Ri Ryong Nam dijo que en el periodo del ano de amistad Corea-Rusia se efectuaron con dinamismo entre ambas partes las visitas de alto nivel y otros intercambios de las delegaciones de diferentes niveles en todos los sectores incluyendo la politica, la economia y la cultura y los actos politico-culturales.
					
					El gobierno de la RPDC mantiene la invariable posicion de intensificar las relaciones con Rusia, senalo y manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-Rusia se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas  tambien en el futuro.
					
					Alexandr Galushka recalco que bajo la profunda atencion del presidente de la Federacion Rusa y el estimado camarada Kim Jong Un las relaciones de amistad Rusia-Corea siguen  desarrollandose positivamente.
					
					Continuo que Rusia hara todos los esfuerzos por la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el desarrollo de relaciones de amistad entre ambos paises.
					
					A su vez, Matsegora subrayo que las multilaterales actividades de intercambio en varios sectores inclusive la funcion conjunta del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la banda Chongbong efectuada en Rusia, contribuyeron a manifestar las relaciones camaraderiles y amistosas entre ambos paises.

articles.title: Continua en Pyongyang gran funcion artistica de 10 mil personas
articles.content:
Continua en Pyongyang gran funcion artistica de 10 mil personas
						
Pyongyang, 14 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar con solemnidad a la orilla del rio Taedong frente a la plaza Kim Il Sung la gran funcion artistica de 10 mil personas "Gran Partido, brillante Corea" por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Se pusieron en la escena el solo masculino y el coro "Cancion de la camaraderia", el coro "En el camino de lucha siguiendo al General", el coro y el baile "Mayo de triunfo", la cancion con acompanamiento de Oungum y el coro "Hemos comenzado de la nada", la musica orquestal y la musica en serie "Cancion de gran marcha de Chollima" y "En pos de la bandera del Partido" y otras piezas.
					
					Se presentaron los viejos cantantes y concertistas que aportaron al florecimiento y el desarrollo de arte musical del Juche bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La funcion se llevo al climax por la interpretacion de la melodia alegre del Conjunto de Musica Electronica Pochonbo y el Conjunto de Musica Ligera Wangjaesan (de aquel entonces) y la presentacion de los artistas muy conocidos entre los habitantes.
					
					La funcion conmovio a los espectadores por la voz rica, buen acoplamiento y el sonido maravilloso de la musica instrumental, asi como por la anoranza infinita al gran Padre quien con mucho trabajo formo a los artistas tan excelentes.
					
					La funcion continua.
